purpose: Enables developers to build and orchestrate agentic workflows and AI systems in Java, focusing on RAG systems
principle: Utilizes Java-based frameworks and libraries to create and manage agent workflows, with integration capabilities for AI models
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for seamless integration into Java applications, allowing for custom workflow configurations
limitations: Primarily focused on Java, limiting its use in non-Java environments; requires familiarity with Java programming
name: jai-workflow
description: Build programmatically custom agentic workflows, AI Agents, RAG systems for java
highlight: Facilitates the creation of custom agentic workflows and AI agents specifically for Java environments
